title: Womens Maxi Dress
title_original: State Cashmere Women's 100% Cashmere Open Front Long Cardigan Oversized Sweater with Straight Hem

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's style stunning. However, the cashmere content receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it feels like 100% acrylic.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning sweater for all occasions
items.body: Stunning sweater that wears so comfortably and fits to a T Read more
items.author: beth shuman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black sweater is as necessary as the right black dress.
items.body: Beautiful and comfortable fit. Very satisfied with my purchase. Read more
items.author: P VEGOSEN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length is shorter than shown.
items.body: I’m 5’2” tall and this hit me just below the waist which was perfect. I was afraid it would be too long, but not the case. It’s also a very nice weight cashmere. I love it! Read more
items.author: Judith Ransom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pinkish white
items.body: Really nice. White is more off-white than it appears; I’d say more of a blush or a very pale pink. It’s a keeper, but I’m still on a quest to find a truly white cashmere duster. Read more
items.author: Katherine H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful wardrobe staple.
items.body: It’s a lovely color, length, and weight of sweater perfect for my upcoming trip to Paris. I will love wearing this quality sweater for many years. Very versatile. Read more
items.author: Maggie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real cashmere
items.body: Love it. The only thing missing...pockets Read more
items.author: Star 7

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT cashmere - feels like 100% acrylic from Ross Dress for Less
items.body: Utter garbage. Tissue thin. Abrasive synthetic fabric. Poor quality finishing - the sleeves are sewn on and not knitted together. If you saw this in a store, you'd go right past it. I have cashmere sweaters. I ordered a cashmere sweater. I did not get a cashmere sweater. Read more
items.author: Anonnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good style
items.body: Bought a few items and this one has the best style. Recommend. Read more
items.author: Flora Z.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Heather Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
